channel.title: CVE Feed for TeraTerm Project -- The installer of Tera Term
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TeraTerm Project -- The installer of Tera Term

item.title: CVE-2017-2193|2024-08-05T13:48:03.643Z -- teraterm%20project -- the%20installer%20of%20tera%20term
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installer of Tera Term 4.94 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
